parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Orders a unit to process command defined by [[FSM]] file (via the radio).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>unitName '''commandFSM''' [fsm name, position, target]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] or [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [fsm name, position, target]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne [[commandFSM]] ["move.fsm", [[position]] [[player]], [[player]]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[FSM]], [[FSM_Editor_Manual]], [[execFSM]], [[completedFSM]], [[doFSM]], [[getFSMVariable]], [[setFSMVariable]]
</value></part></template>
